bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Information Technology
Telecommunications and information exchange between systems
Wireless Regional Area Networks (WRAN) -- Specific requirements -- Part 22.2: Recommended Practice for the Installation and Deployment of IEEE 802.22 Systems

IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for Information Technology - Telecommunications and information exchange between systems - Wireless Regional Area Networks (WRAN) -- Specific requirements -- Part 22.2: Recommended Practice for the Installation and Deployment of IEEE 802.22 Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This document recommends best engineering practices 1 for the installation and deployment of IEEE 802.22 systems to help assure that such systems are correctly installed and deployed

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
